Yugito rushes towards her opponent, hitting them with a series of clawed stabs and kicks, hits them a few more times while zig-zagging, and finishes it with a two-handed stabbing attack.

== Trivia ==
* The last part of this attack is derived from Yugito's attack against [[Killer B]] in chapter [[The Man Who Is Nobody|564]].
